root.name: Uzumaki: Denshi Kaikihen
root.description: OverviewUzumaki: Denshi Kaikihen is an interactive horror manga based on the manga Uzumaki by Junji Ito. It is a the struggles of a girl in an isolated Japanese town as it comes to be possessed by the very concept of the spiral shape ("Uzumaki" is the Japanese word for "spiral").
